>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.dE8h1C8gOUyzeS0J]{Epiphanies}

When you cast an instantaneous spell that deals damage, you can increase the spell’s damage by an amount equal to half your mystic level. This increased damage applies to all creatures damaged by an area spell, but for spells that target multiple creatures with multiple rays or other attacks, the increased damage applies only to a single ray or missile. This increased damage doesn’t apply to ongoing damage from the spell (such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Burn} damage). This epiphany doesn’t increase ability damage or other spell effects, only damage to Stamina Points or Hit Points.
